runutils

Class BuildSys

  • java.lang.Object
    • runutils.BuildSys

  • public class BuildSys
extends java.lang.Object
    Configures build files, make executions, logs the compiler outputs.

      • compile

        public static void compile(java.lang.String file,
                           java.io.PrintStream out,
                           java.io.PrintStream err)
        Description: compile method that maintains the i/o streams after the task is done.
        Parameters:
        file - path of the build xml to be executed
        out - current output stream
        err - current input stream

      • altCompile

        public static void altCompile(java.lang.String file)
        Description: compile method that does not maintains the i/o streams after the task is done. This is an alternative for the current compile method for future uses.
        Parameters:
        file - path of the build xml to be executed
